DOC.brief_title: Low Field Magnetic Stimulation ( LFMS ) Subjects With Treatment-Resistant Depression ( TRD )
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study : - To compare relative efficacy , measure change 6-item Hamilton Rating Scale Depression ( HAM-D6 ) , 20 60 minute LFMS compare sham ( placebo ) subject treatment resistant depression ( TRD ) . Secondary objective : - To determine subject TRD may respond 120 minute LFMS . - To determine persistence response LFMS therapy observation period . - To evaluate safety tolerability LFMS .
